title: Draw and Collect
desc: I have made an interactive physics game that combines...nd physics simulation. The player uses their finger movements,

title: HoloRig
desc: HoloRig is a real-time gesture-controlled holographic interaction system using MediaPipe hand tracking, geometric gesture logic, and 3D/IK simulation to create an intuitive touch-free interface.

title: AT-AT Walker
desc: A mechanical design of a 4-legged walker inspired by the Star Wars AT-AT, featuring worm gears, improved leg linkage for natural foot motion, and an attempted universal-joint based turning mechanism, modeled in Onshape.

title: Light Pattern Based Locker
desc: A locker system that uses a specific light pattern sensed by photoresistors as a verification mechanism. Voltage drops across the sensors are read through Arduino analog pins, with LEDs indicating correctness, an LCD for user interaction, and a button to initiate or lock the system.

title: Smart Cricket Stumps
desc: An automated bail-detection system using an LDR sensor, ATmega328P, LEDs, buzzer, and Bluetooth, all integrated into a compact two-layer PCB that fits inside cricket stumps/bails. Detects bail movement in under 50 ms with 10-hour battery life and 15 m wireless range.

title: ESP-Assisted Typing Guide
desc: An ESP8266-based typing assistant where the microcontroller connects over Wi-Fi to a Python curses interface. Each character typed in the interactive shell sends a corresponding signal to the ESP, enabling a hardware-linked typing guide system.

title: Neon Gesture Game
desc: Gesture-controlled neon game using Python with MediaPipe Hand Tracking, FaceMesh double-blink reset, and a Pygame-based neon world.

title: ID Card Verfication System
desc: A system that verifies student ID cards using Mediapipe and OpenCV, and also counts the number of students from each year to reduce gate-entry delays during rush hours.

title: Robotic Arm
desc: A robotic arm designed by modelling all 8 parts individually using physical measurements and assembling them in Onshape with appropriate mates.

title: Torque Titan
desc: A crude Robowars combat machine concept featuring dual metallic plates on a wooden support, a rotating blade driven by a geared motor, and dual-side wheels for operation even when flipped. Designed in Onshape with a spur gear mechanism.

title: Robotic Arm
desc: A movable robotic arm designed and modeled in Onshape.

title: Metal Fusion x JoJo's Beyblade
desc: A fully custom, lore-accurate Beyblade designed from scratch in Onshape using a wide range of modeling tools, featuring unique unsymmetrical attack-oriented geometry and material customisation, ready for 3D printing.

title: Robotic Arm
desc: A robotic arm created by combining a tutorial-based base with a self-designed gripper modeled from reference images and assembled in Onshape.

title: PCB for Drones
desc: A drone Power Distribution Board featuring XT60 input with fuse protection, LTC4359-based reverse polarity and surge protection, capacitors for noise filtering, power routing to four ESCs, and an LM2596 buck converter for regulated 5V output, ensuring safe and stable power delivery.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
desc: A Python-based Tic-tac-toe game using OpenCV for video processing and MediaPipe for hand tracking, allowing gesture-controlled gameplay through index-finger detection.
